attributes.action: Promote General Sir Richard Dannatt upon his retirement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
General Sir Richard Dannatt has been an outspoken critic on soldiers pay and conditions and for this he should be honoured.

It is for this reason that he, one of the greatest military leaders of the governments recent wars, should be recommended to the Queen for promotion to Field Marshal.

This would show the governments, and the British peoples appreciation for him, and all of the soldiers he leads and represents.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
